title: RM Triathlon Registration Now Open
excerpt: Early bird registration for the 2026 Riding Mountain Triathlon is now open with special discounts and early wave selection available.
content: Early bird registration for the 2026 Riding Mountain Triathlon is now open with special discounts and early wave selection available.
author: Coach Dave

title: Winter Training Camp Success
excerpt: Our winter training camp wrapped up with excellent progression across all age groups. Athletes showed remarkable improvement in technique and endurance.
content: Our winter training camp wrapped up with excellent progression across all age groups. Athletes showed remarkable improvement in technique and endurance.
author: Coach Dave

title: New Coaching Staff Announcement
excerpt: We're excited to welcome new assistant coaches to the Windburn family. Meet the expanded team dedicated to athlete development and performance.
content: We're excited to welcome new assistant coaches to the Windburn family. Meet the expanded team dedicated to athlete development and performance.
author: Admin

title: 2025 Season Highlights & Achievements
excerpt: An incredible year of racing and development. Our athletes achieved personal bests and podium finishes across multiple competitions.
content: An incredible year of racing and development. Our athletes achieved personal bests and podium finishes across multiple competitions.
author: Coach Dave

title: DEVO Team Recruitment Now Open
excerpt: Looking for young athletes aged 12-15 to join our development program. Early registration opens for the 2026 training season.

title: Partnership Expansion with Local Businesses
